title: Microsoft Graph Security Intel
description: This OpenCTI connector allows the ability to create or delete data from your OpenCTI platform to either the MicrosoftSentinel or Microsoft Defender for Endpoint platform utilizingthe Microsoft Graph API Threat Intelligence Indicator.Microsoft has a detailed guide on how to get started with connecting your threat intelligence platform to Sentinelfound here.
short_description: This OpenCTI connector allows the ability to create or delete data from your OpenCTI platform to either the MicrosoftSentinel or Microsoft Defender for Endpoint platform utilizingthe Microsoft Graph API Threat Intelligence Indicator.Microsoft has a detailed guide on how to get started with connecting your threat intelligence platform to Sentinelfound here.
